author: TonyVision
post_text: July 26, 2014 at 9:27 PM#1Hello,I'm just beginning to dive into the macro world and things are begining to make sense to me a bit.  But I am am having trouble creating an AutoCreate Macro.I can't seem to find AutoCreate in the cd/ listI want to make a make a macro that quickly creates the new MA Colors in the Additional Presets/Swatchbook tab of AutoCreate.  I can't seem to find the path to it.  Any hints?I would also like to make a macro for the AutoCreate Hue/Saturation.  Basically asking me "what group", "how many hues", "how many saturation" "add or merge MixColor"Can someone point me in the right direction?Thank you.
